SEARCH
Package grafiosch.repository

Interface TenantBaseCustom

All Known Subinterfaces:
TenantJpaRepository, TenantJpaRepository, TenantJpaRepositoryCustom, TenantJpaRepositoryCustom
All Known Implementing Classes:
TenantBaseImpl, TenantJpaRepositoryImpl
public interface TenantBaseCustom
Custom repository interface for tenant-specific data operations. Provides functionality for data deletion and export operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteMyDataAndUserAccount()
    Deletes all personal data and user account for the currently authenticated user.
    void
    getExportPersonalDataAsZip(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
    Exports all personal data for the currently authenticated user as a ZIP file.

  • Method Details

    • deleteMyDataAndUserAccount

      void deleteMyDataAndUserAccount() throws Exception
      Deletes all personal data and user account for the currently authenticated user. This operation removes all user-specific data from the system and cannot be undone.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the deletion operation fails or user is not authenticated

    • getExportPersonalDataAsZip

      void getExportPersonalDataAsZip(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception
      Exports all personal data for the currently authenticated user as a ZIP file. The ZIP contains SQL scripts with table structures and user data.
      Parameters:
      response - the HTTP response to write the ZIP file to
      Throws:
      Exception - if the export operation fails or user is not authenticated
